Articles.Content: Hi! I've actually been playing KSP for a while now (so long that I can't actually remember where I heard about it from), and have been lurking around the forums for almost as long, and I figured that I might as well take the plunge and make an account. So here I am!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
